title: Our UNESCO Chair members with students visit the Polish Tatars in Kruszyniany
content: On 14–15 January 2026, members of our UNESCO Chair, Prof. Hanna Schreiber and MA Mateusz Zając, participated in a  study trip to Supraśl  organised for students of the  Cultural Policy and Cultural Management programme  at the Faculty of Political Science and International Studies, University of Warsaw. The trip was held as part of the study programme titled  Experiencing Culture . The primary aim of the visit was to provide a space for the presentation and discussion of...
creator: admin
